text: Mazyar Asadi (, born 21 March 1979 in Tehran) is an Iranian photographer who specializes in photojournalism. == Early life == Asadi's first work was with major news agencies, websites, and newspapers from 2013. In 2017, he graduated with a BA degree in photojournalism at Tehran News University, in addition to his Diploma and Skill Trade Certificates from Iran's Technical and Vocational Training Organization in 2012. He has received more than 40 awards and trophies from contests including Gold medal in Canada, Silver medal in Canada (2015), Silver medal in Turkey and a Bronze medal in Spain. and some Ribbons and Honorable Mention Awards from Canada, Romania, UK (2014) and Iran. and Youth (Iran),http://news.msy.gov.ir/index.php?module=cdk&func;=loadmodule&system;=cdk&sismodule;=user/content_view.php&sisOp;=view&ctp;_id=19&cnt;_id=1088546&id;=225054 , member of the Iranian Press Photojournalism Association, and member of the Iranian Photography Association. == Project == * Awareness "The Universal Sea" The art and innovation movement to stop the plastic epidemic. A series of Photo Exhibition by “The Universal Sea” about protecting our sea from pollution, held in the Centre of Polish Sculpture in Oronsko (Poland, 22 April 2018), Baltic Sea Helsinki (Finland, 5–6 June 2018), Pristina (Kosovo 9–10 June 2018), Watternmeer World Heritage Site (Germany, 25 July 2018). == Honors and awards == * Referee short-listed photos, Two in the Photojournalism section (out of 1,414 world-wide submissions) and One in the Open colour section (out of 1,995 world-wide submissions) https://nycexhibition.com/wp- content/uploads/2020/08/Awarded-Accepted-Empire-State-.pdf Sep 2020, The EMPIRE STATE 2020 international Photo Contest, New York City, United States * TOP 100 Nominee photographers in the world of Daily Life Category (out of 117,541 people from 173 countries and 418 thousand photos). June 2020 honor issuer 5th International Photography Contest (35 Awards), Moscow, Russiahttps://35awards.com/author/mazyarasadi/ * Finalists of the 17th annual Smithsonian (magazine) photo contest. https://www.smithsonianmag.com/photocontest/archive/2019/,https://www.msn.com/en- gb/news/photos/from-a-mongolian-eagle-hunter-to-lady-liberty-herself-the- stunning-finalists-in-smithsonian-magazines-annual-photo-contest/ss- BB10Mgx5?li=AAnInVJ, https://internewscast.com/the-spectacular-finalists-of- the-smithsonian-magazine-annual-photo-contest/. Mar 2020, (60 images were selected from more than 36,000 entries submitted by photographers hailing from 145 countries and territories),Washington, D.C.,United States * 1st place award, the 1st "Ghabe Sorkh" Eslamshahr Photo Festival. Dec 2018 honor issuer the Canadian Association of Photographic Art (CAPA), Vancouver, Canada * 1st place award, the 1st "Emam Reza" Mashhad Photo Festival. 31 Jan 2019 – Mashhad, Iran . Nov 2013 honor issuer Doorbin.Net Festival.Tehran,Iran == Publications == * Selected co- author of the book “Generations / Generazioni” https://www.exhibitaround.com/en/generazioni-miglior-autore-e-menzioni-donore/ August 2020 Exhibit Around Books in collaboration with the AsSostegno associationz,Italy * Alpine Fellowship, Shortlisted Mar 2019 publication description The Alpine Fellowship * Photo in Book "The Universal Sea, Pure or Plastic" Mar 2019 publication description The Institute for Art and Innovation e.v. * Documentary photo story book "Ashura-Day" (44-Pg) Cyprus Nov 2018 publication description Cine-Books, a visual storytelling platform * supply photos for Zoroastrian religious text book. first, second, third, and fourth grade of primary school.
